1.title: The Planet Song

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Did you know Venus is the hottest planet? and Jupiter the biggest? Sing along and learn about the planets.

2.title: What Do You Like To Eat?

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: What is your favorite food? Discover with us the different dishes from around the world.

3.title: Sailing On The Sea

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Learn about some of the animals of the sea. Come sail with us and discover some of its greatest inhabitants.

4.title: What's That Animal Over There?

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Learn some of the animals from the jungle. Is it a lion? a hippopotamus? a frog? Discover with us what's that animal over there.

5.title: The Dino Cup

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: The World Cup is almost here. but the Dino Cup has already begun. Sing and dance at the Dino Cup.

6.title: Brush Your Teeth

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Brushing our teeth is super important to keep them healthy. follow along this fun song and don't forget to brush your teeth.

7.title: Adventure Through The Snow

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Learn about the animals that love the cold. put on your snow gear and discover them with us.

8.title: Out In The Desert

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Learn about the animals that love the cold. put on your snow gear and discover them with us.

9.title: The Phases Of The Moon

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Did you know there are 8 phases of the moon? Learn with us what they are and what they look like.

10.title: We're Going To Find A Treasure

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: This song is great for learning different movements. Run, jump, roll, crawl and dig to help us find a treasure in this fun song.

11.title: Singing Scales

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Learn musical scales with us. Come sing with us in this fun song. You'll see how easy and fun it is to learn scales.

12.title: When I Grow Up

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: What do you want to be when you grow up? A scientist? an astronaut? Tell us what you want to be when you grow up.

13.title: Inside The Forest

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Learn some of the different animals from the forest. Come inside with us to find some of its greatest inhabitants.

14.title: The ABC Swing

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: Learn the alphabet with our original ABC Swing. It's so much fun to sing the alphabet.

15.title: The King Of Dinosaurs

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: He's the king of dinosaurs. Tyrannosaurus Rex.

16.title: Elasmosaurus Like To Swim

episode of.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (TV Series 2018– )

16.plot: Put on your swimming gear and join the Elasmosaurus. You'll discover why swimming is so much fun.

imdb.title: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs
akas: The Planet Song & More Kids Songs: HiDino Kids Songs (United States)
plot: This 2nd collection includes some our most beloved songs like "The Planet Song", "Rexy The T-Rex", "The ABC Swing", "Break The Piñata!", and many more of our original kids songs.
